pages.text: $(li)The Fortune enchantment can be applied in any kind of Pickaxe, Axe, Shovel, Hoe, Pickarang or Flamarang.$(br)$(li)This enchantment makes that ores like Coal, Lapis Lazuli, Redstone, Diamond or Emeralds have a higher possibility of drop more items.
pages.title: Fortune

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Fortune).
